translation.en: -You lose. You lose! -You cheated!
No!
By the way, it's not a dinner. It's your surprise birthday party.
translation.es: Por cierto, no es una cena,sino tu cumpleaños sorpresa.

translation.en: -I hate you. -Just don't ruin it for them.
translation.es: - Te odio.- No se lo arruines.

translation.en: [all yell] Surprise!
[in Arabic] Why aren't you surprised?
Seems like you knew, little one.
No, of course not. How could I know?
Happy birthday, darling.
Thanks, Mama.
Now go to your room and change your clothes.
translation.es: Ve a tu dormitorio a cambiarte.

translation.en: OK, everyone, let's eat. Help yourselves.
[reporter in English] The Syrian revolution is starting.
People all on the streets,
translation.es: La gente sale a las calles

translation.en: demanding the removal of President Bashar al-Assad in Damascus.
translation.es: y exigen la destitucióndel presidente Bashar al-Assad en Damasco.

translation.en: We are together, Sunnis and Alawites…
translation.es: Nos hemos unido suníes y alauitas…

translation.en: [in Arabic] Sara, what are you doing? Come dance with us.
-In a minute. -What are you watching?
[in English] A group of Syrian women are shouting…
translation.es: Un grupo de mujeres sirias gritan…

translation.en: [in Arabic] I told you not to watch these things.
translation.es: Te dije que no miraras esas cosas.

translation.en: This is reality, Mama. What happened in Tunisia, Egypt, and Libya is happening here.
translation.es: Mamá, está pasando aquílo mismo que en Túnez, Egipto y Libia.

translation.en: [mother] And I've told you nothing like that can happen in Syria.
translation.es: Te dije que en Siriano puede pasar algo así.

translation.en: [in English] The anger is building--
[mother in Arabic] Yalla, darling.
[Sara] The party's boring. I don't want to. [mother] Come on, for your sister's sake.
translation.es: - La fiesta es aburrida. No quiero ir.- Hazlo por tu hermana.

translation.en: Uncle, come on.
[in English] Everyone say "cheese."
[all] Cheese!
[man in Arabic] I thank God day and night for blessing me with three daughters,
translation.es: Le agradezco a Dios todos los días por haberme bendecido con tres hijasmás fuertes que mil hijos.

translation.en: stronger than a thousand sons.
translation.es: por haberme bendecido con tres hijasmás fuertes que mil hijos.

translation.en: But don't forget how lucky these girls are that I'm their dad
translation.es: Pero no olviden lo afortunadas que sonde que yo sea su padre

translation.en: and their coach.
Here he goes.
Two weeks ago, at the qualifying meet for the National Championships,
translation.es: Hace dos semanas,en la clasificación para el nacional,

translation.en: Yusra improved her personal best in the 100m butterfly.
translation.es: Yusra mejoró su marca personalen los 100 metros de mariposa.

translation.en: [man 2] Congrats, Yusra.
But Sara won her heat too.
[man] Yeah, Sara is headstrong and a leader like me.
translation.es: Sí, Sara es obstinaday una líder natural, como yo.

translation.en: But Yusra has discipline, strength, and perseverance.
translation.es: Pero Yusra tiene disciplina,fuerza y perseverancia.

translation.en: She is my powerhouse.
What about me?
And you, Shahed, Daddy's darling, are my little warrior.
translation.es: Y tú, Shahed, la mimada de papá,eres mi pequeña guerrera.

translation.en: Dear guests, I will be the first father in history
translation.es: Queridos invitados,seré el primer padre en la historia

translation.en: to have three daughters swimming in the Olympics.
translation.es: en tener tres hijasque naden en los Juegos Olímpicos.

translation.en: ♪ Oh, oh, oh, oh, well Can you feel it… ♪
-[girl in English] Isn't that your cousin? -Nizar.
Nizar!
-[in Arabic] How you doing? -Good. Play a song for us.
-What? -Play a song for us.
-What's it worth? -I'll buy you a shot.
translation.es: - ¿Qué gano yo?- Te invito un trago.

translation.en: For you guys.
[woman 2] Go, Sara, go! Kick his ass!
Show me, then.
No, you can't do that.
No, I swear you can't do that.
translation.es: No, no puedes hacer eso, en serio.

translation.en: [in English] It's late. We should go home.
translation.es: Es tarde. Deberíamos irnos a casa.

translation.en: [in Arabic] Why?
[in English] We have to be at the pool at six.
Do you seriously think there's any point in training anymore?
-If I want to make the Olympics. -[Sara] The Olympics?
translation.es: - Sí, para ir a los Juegos Olímpicos.- ¿Los Juegos Olímpicos?

translation.en: Swimming for who?
There's no country left anymore.
Syria's gone! Bah. Haven't you noticed?
It is still early.
[Nizar in Arabic] What?
-What? -Razan Haddad is dead.
[Sara] In a bombing.
[in English] It's all over Facebook.
[in Arabic] My God…
I just saw her.
[in English] You see? All the more reason to go home.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Más motivos para irnos a casa.

translation.en: All the more reason to party.
[in Arabic] Sara, be careful. Get back in.
translation.es: Sara, ten cuidado. Métete al auto.

translation.en: You're so annoying. Hala, you can help me, you know.
[shouts] Razan Haddad! We'll never forget you!
Bye!
[soldier] Hey, beautiful.
[soldier 2] What's up, ladies?
Come have a drink with us. Unless you don't like the look of me?
translation.es: Vengan a beber algo con nosotros,salvo que no les guste.

translation.en: Aren't we good enough for you?
[in English] I hate living in this neighborhood.
-[helicopter whirring] -[in Arabic] Where have you been?
Aren't you out a little late tonight?
translation.es: ¿No se les hizo un poco tarde?

translation.en: [Yusra whispering] Sara, shush, be careful.
translation.es: Sara, no hagas ruido, ten cuidado.

translation.en: Give me the keys.
-You'll wake Baba and Mama. -[Sara] Shh.
[whispering] Lulu.
How are you, darling?
-Don't be frightened. -[distant bombing]
Good night, my love.
[mother] Do you have any idea what time it is?
Do you know what your dad would do if he knew?
translation.es: ¿Sabes lo que haría tu padresi se enterara?

translation.en: [in English] Sorry.
[in Arabic] Did you hear about Razan Haddad?
translation.es: ¿Te enteraste de lo de Razan Haddad?

translation.en: I heard.
God bless her soul and give her mother strength.
translation.es: Dios bendiga su almay le dé fuerza a su madre.

translation.en: Yalla, darling. Time to sleep. You have training in the morning.
translation.es: Yalla, cariño. Es hora de dormir.Debes entrenar por la mañana.

translation.en: What was my time?
You're tired.
What was my time, Baba?
Coach. I'll see you at home.
[announcer] And it's Michael Phelps here in the 100m fly,
translation.es: Michael Phelps, en los 100 m de mariposa,

translation.en: going for his seventh gold medal of these Games. Phelps in lane five.
translation.es: buscará su séptima medallaen estos Juegos, en el quinto carril.

translation.en: [in Arabic] You see? It's all arm propulsion, not the kick.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Propulsión de los brazos,no tanta patada.

translation.en: You know he went to Sydney when he was 15?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que fue a los de Sídneycuando tenía 15 años?

translation.en: [announcer] But here comes Phelps!
[Yusra] The youngest American swimmer to compete at the Olympics.
translation.es: El nadador estadounidense más jovenen los Juegos.

translation.en: [announcer] He gets it done! A new Olympic record.
You aren't a true athlete unless your dream is the Olympics.
translation.es: No eres una atleta realsi no sueñas con los Juegos Olímpicos.

translation.en: You're not going to represent us at the Nationals this time.
translation.es: Esta vezno nos representarás en las nacionales.

translation.en: Yusra and Arwa got better times than you.
translation.es: Yusra y Arwa hicieron mejores tiempos.

translation.en: [announcer] Everything going perfectly for Michael Phelps here in Beijing.
translation.es: Todo va a la perfecciónaquí en Beijing para Michael Phelps.

translation.en: -[Sara in English] Hala left for Germany. -[Yusra] What?
translation.es: - Hala se fue a Hannover, Alemania.- ¿Qué?

translation.en: -She went alone without her family. -Why didn't she tell us?
translation.es: - Se fue sin su familia.- ¿Por qué no nos contó?

translation.en: She's gonna apply for this family reunion thing.
When younger than 18, you have the right for your family to join you.
translation.es: Si eres menor de 18 años,puedes pedir que vaya tu familia.

translation.en: Can't believe she didn't tell us.
-[chuckles] -[in Arabic] You're disgusting.
[in English, laughing] I'm gonna post it!
No, actually, I don't wanna lose followers.
translation.es: Mejor no. No quiero perder seguidores.

translation.en: [in Arabic] IDs.
Omar?
From Duma? What are you doing here?
-[laughs] -[Yusra] Sara.
Why are you laughing?
Since when has laughing become illegal?
Give me your ID.
Please, she didn't mean disrespect.
Shut up, you.
[Sara] I'm not disrespecting.
Don't talk too much. Understand?
Raise your arms.
You'd do this to your sisters?
You're not my sister.
Is this your sister?
Stand up.
[soldier 2] Raise your arms.
Sniper!
[soldier 3] Eyes up!
Look up!
Go. There are people on the bus.
translation.es: Váyanse. Hay gente en el autobús.

translation.en: YOUR PLANES CAN'T BOMB OUR DREAMS
translation.es: SUS AVIONESNO PODRÁN BOMBARDEAR NUESTROS SUEÑOS

translation.en: [father] How can I let my girls travel across Europe on their own?
translation.es: ¿Cómo permitiré que mis hijasviajen solas por Europa?

translation.en: What happened to the strong daughters you raised?
translation.es: ¿Y qué pasócon esas hijas fuertes que criaste?

translation.en: You know Razan Haddad is my third friend to die this month?
translation.es: Razan Haddades mi tercera amiga en morir este mes.

translation.en: You know how many times we've come close to death?
We need to get Yusra to Germany as soon as possible before she turns 18.
translation.es: Debemos enviar a Yusra a Alemaniaantes de que cumpla 18 años.

translation.en: [mother] The problem is it's so dangerous, my love.
translation.es: El problema, mi amor,es que es muy peligroso.

translation.en: I wish you could go on a plane.
translation.es: Ojalá pudieran ir en un avión.

translation.en: Because European countries are just handing out visas to Syrians.
translation.es: Claro, porque los europeosles reparten visas a los sirios.

translation.en: Mama, it's very easy. We get to Germany and apply for family reunion,
translation.es: Mamá, es sencillo. En Alemania,pedimos la reunificación familiar

translation.en: and you can all come on a plane. It's simple.
translation.es: y ustedes pueden ir en avión. Es simple.

translation.en: So I let you two risk your lives,
crawl through the most dangerous parts of Europe, to get us plane tickets?
translation.es: en las zonas más peligrosas de Europapor unos pasajes de avión?

translation.en: Everyone's doing it. Hala did it. She told me it's really easy…
translation.es: Todos lo hacen. Hala lo hizo.Me dijo que es muy fácil y…

translation.en: [Yusra] My darling, come here.
-[father] It's out in the neighborhood. -[Shahed] I'm scared of the dark.
translation.es: - Es todo el vecindario.- Le temo a la oscuridad.

translation.en: Don't be scared, little one.
I hope the car battery will last.
translation.es: Espero que dure la batería del auto.

translation.en: [Yusra] Yalla, see? Now eat up.
translation.es: Yalla, aquí tienen. Terminen de comer.

translation.en: I wish we could go back to Darayya.
-Darayya is still too dangerous. -The whole of Syria is too dangerous.
translation.es: - Darayya aún es muy peligroso.- Toda Siria es muy peligrosa.

translation.en: But you and your sister walking across Europe isn't dangerous at all?
translation.es: Pero ¿no es peligrosoque crucen Europa a pie?

translation.en: Yes, but once we arrive, we'll all be safe.
translation.es: Sí, pero al llegar, estaremos a salvo.

translation.en: That's if you arrive.
And if you arrive, what will you be?
Refugees?
And you'll ruin your swimming careers.
[Sara] It's the best way.
[father] She always thinks she has the best way.
translation.es: Siempre crees saber qué es mejor.

translation.en: [angrily] You're not going.
That's the end of it.
If I was the one who was 17, you'd let me go on my own.
translation.es: Si yo fuera la que tiene 17 años,me dejarías ir sola.

translation.en: [in English] It's your precious Yusra you don't want to risk.
translation.es: No quieres arriesgar a tu preciada Yusra.

translation.en: [in Arabic] Baba, about Sara…
Stop thinking about her.
Concentrate.
In the water, you're on your own. It's your fight.
translation.es: En el agua estás sola. Es tú pelea.

translation.en: Your aim is to win. It's not about being nice.
translation.es: Tu objetivo es ganar, no ser amable.

translation.en: You have a goal, and you must reach it.
translation.es: Tienes un objetivo. Ve por él.

translation.en: Focus on all the things you have control over.
translation.es: Concéntrate en las cosasque puedes controlar.

translation.en: The start.
Streamline.
The kick off the wall. Your breathing.
translation.es: El impulso desde el muro. Tu respiración.

translation.en: [in English] Find your lane. Swim your race.
translation.es: Encuentra tu carril. Nada tu carrera.

translation.en: [announcer in English] Take your marks.
Yusra! Yusra!
Yusra! Yusra! Yusra! Yusra! Yusra!
Yusra! Yusra!
Yusra!
[Sara] Yusra!
[in Arabic] Two people died on the football field.
translation.es: Dos muertos en la cancha de fútbol.

translation.en: [Yusra] Baba.
Nizar is going to Germany.
[scoffs] Nizar?
He'll travel with me and Sara and protect us.
translation.es: Viajará con nosotras y nos protegerá.

translation.en: I wouldn't trust him to cross the road with you, let alone take you all the way to Germany.
translation.es: No le confiaría el cruzar la calle,mucho menos llegar a Alemania.

translation.en: [mother] But, Ezzat, Nizar is their cousin.
-You know he would never leave them. -Whose side are you on?
translation.es: - Sabes que no las dejaría.- ¿De qué lado estás?

translation.en: [mother] I'm not taking sides.
This isn't about us. It's about the girls' lives.
translation.es: Esto no es por nosotros,es por las vidas de nuestras hijas.

translation.en: They don't have a future here anymore.
translation.es: Ya no tienen un futuro aquí.

translation.en: They're not going to summer camp. Aren't you a mother?
translation.es: No es un campamento de verano.¿Acaso no eres madre?

translation.en: Baba, you see what's happening. The situation's gone from bad to worse.
translation.es: Baba, ves lo que está pasando.La situación va de mal en peor.

translation.en: How am I gonna make it to the Olympics if I can't swim?
translation.es: ¿Cómo iré a los Juegos Olímpicossin poder nadar?

translation.en: I promise, when I get to Europe, I'll keep training.
translation.es: Te prometo que,al llegar a Europa, seguiré entrenando.

translation.en: All the swimmers are leaving.
translation.es: Todos los nadadores se están yendo.

translation.en: See? I want to go. I want to keep training.
I'll have to go with you. [Sara] And leave Mama and Shahed on their own?
translation.es: - Tendré que ir con ustedes.- ¿Y mamá y Shahed?

translation.en: What will become of me if something happens to her?
translation.es: ¿Qué será de mí si le pasa algo?

translation.en: [Sara] Nothing will happen. Nizar and I will be with her.
translation.es: No le pasará nada.Nizar y yo estaremos con ella.

translation.en: I promise.
[Yusra] Thank you, Baba.
[in English] Please, don't make me look like a liar.
translation.es: No me hagas quedar como una mentirosa.

translation.en: [in Arabic] I'm not going with you.
[in English] OK? It's cold there, and I don't like the cold.
translation.es: No iré con ustedes, ¿sí? Allá hace frío y no me gusta el frío.

translation.en: And I don't speak German. I speak English. Romy knows a sponsor in Canada.
translation.es: Y no hablo alemán. Hablo inglés. Romy conoce a alguien en Canadáque me ayudará para ir a Toronto.

translation.en: He's gonna help me with my papers, so I can go to Toronto.
translation.es: Romy conoce a alguien en Canadáque me ayudará para ir a Toronto.

translation.en: -It never works, these things. -[scoffs]
Canada is colder than Germany. So good luck!
translation.es: En Canadá hace más frío que en Alemania. Así que ¡suerte!

translation.en: [in English] Is she right?
[in Arabic] Dunno.
[in English] Canada is colder than Germany?
-Of course. -[Sara] Don't think Germany. Think Berlin.
translation.es: - Claro.- No pienses en Alemania, sino en Berlín.

translation.en: DJ capital of the world, parties that go on all weekend.
translation.es: La capital mundial de los DJ,fiestas que duran todo el fin de semana,

translation.en: Underground clubs.
Berghain.
-How do you know Berghain? -Of course I know.
DJ Niz needs European exposure.
translation.es: El DJ Niz necesita conocer Europa.

translation.en: More people will listen to your mixes.
How can you let your two favorite cousins go to Europe without you?
translation.es: ¿Dejarás que tus dos primas favoritasvayan a Europa sin ti?

translation.en: But you're not my favorite cousins. I have other cousins who are nice to me.
translation.es: No son mis favoritas. Otras primas me tratan mejor.

translation.en: Fine. We will go without you.
[Ezzat in Arabic] You fly to Istanbul on a tourist visa.
translation.es: Irán a Estambul en avióncon una visa turista.

translation.en: If anyone asks anything, you're tourists going to Turkey on holiday.
translation.es: Si les preguntan algo,son turistas de vacaciones en Turquía.

translation.en: Find a smuggler to take you over the Bulgarian border.
translation.es: Busquen quien los crucepor la frontera búlgara.

translation.en: This route is more expensive than the sea crossing, but much safer.
translation.es: Es más costoso que cruzar por mar,pero es mucho más seguro.

translation.en: -Ten thousand euros. Guard it. -How did you get it?
translation.es: - Diez mil euros. Cuídenlos.- ¿Cómo los conseguiste?

translation.en: I borrowed it.
Isn't it too much, Baba? Keep some for yourselves.
translation.es: ¿No es demasiado, baba?Guarden un poco para ustedes.

translation.en: I'll try to get more in case you get stuck.
translation.es: Intentaré conseguir másen caso de que los paren.

translation.en: But if you do get stuck, you do the talking.
translation.es: Pero si los paran, hablarás tú, ¿sí?

translation.en: Of course. Don't worry, Uncle.
translation.es: Por supuesto. No te preocupes, tío.

translation.en: This is yours.
Tell people you swam for your country.
translation.es: Dile a la genteque has nadado por tu país.

translation.en: That has to matter.
You too, Sara.
Can I borrow your Converse?
No, they are too big for you, and I'm taking them with me.
translation.es: No, son demasiado grandes para tiy me las llevaré.

translation.en: Can I use your nail polish?
No, you'll ruin it.
Can I come with you?
Who would take care of Lulu?
Look what I made you.
You made this?
[Shahed] It's to help you get to Germany.
translation.es: Para que te ayude a llegar a Alemania.

translation.en: Oh, my love.
I'm going to take it with me.
Let's put Lulu in her cage before she poops on your bed.
translation.es: Regresemos a Lulu a su jaulao ensuciará tu cama.

translation.en: -[Shahed] Come help us. -What are you doing?
[Yusra] Lulu's flying!
[mother] When you were born,
I decided to give you the things I didn't have.
translation.es: decidí darles todo lo que yo no tuve.

translation.en: Freedom to choose whatever you want in life.
translation.es: Libertad para elegirlo que quisieran hacer de su vida.

translation.en: When I closed my eyes and imagined your futures…
translation.es: Cuando cerraba los ojose imaginaba sus futuros…

translation.en: [Ezzat] Here he comes.
[mother] …I didn't picture you in a wedding dress like the other mothers.
translation.es: …no las imaginaba vestidas de noviacomo las demás madres.

translation.en: Sorry I'm late.
[Ezzat] What happened to you? I forgot my passport.
All I hoped was for you to graduate from the best universities…
translation.es: Quería que estudiaranen las mejores universidades…

translation.en: Don't worry. They are like my sisters. I'll guard them with my life.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Son como mis hermanas. Las cuidaré con mi vida.

translation.en: Come here.
[mother] Having wonderful careers and living the best life,
that was everything I wished for.
translation.es: Eso es lo que les deseaba.

translation.en: And we'll have all these things, Mama.
[mother] Hopefully.
Oh, my love.
-I'll keep her safe. Don't worry. -[mother] Keep yourself safe too.
translation.es: - La cuidaré bien. Descuida.- Cuídate tú también.

translation.en: As soon as you arrive, call us, OK?
[Ezzat] Do you know that I love you?
I know. [Ezzat] Do you really know?
Don't go. Please don't go.
translation.es: No se vayan. Por favor, no se vayan.

translation.en: We'll meet in Germany soon.
I swear. Really soon.
-[agent] Passports. Where are you going? -[Nizar] Istanbul.
-[security in English] Laptop, telephone… -[mother in Arabic] Have a safe journey.
[security in English] Laptop, telephone, computer.
[in Arabic] May God protect you.
[announcement in English] Passengers landing on flight number 221 to Istanbul via Beirut,
translation.es: Pasajeros del vuelo 221con destino a Estambul vía Beirut,

translation.en: make your way to the gate now.
translation.es: diríjanse a la puerta de embarque.

translation.en: [steward in Arabic] Welcome aboard this flight to Istanbul.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a bordo del vuelo a Estambul.

translation.en: We would like to remind you that life jackets are the property of the airline.
translation.es: Les recordamos que los chalecos salvavidasson propiedad de la aerolínea.

translation.en: Any attempt to take them will be considered
an act of theft, and you will be prosecuted.
translation.es: será considerado un roboy serán detenidos.

translation.en: [in English] And the airline would like to remind you
that you're a bunch of homeless refugees now.
translation.es: que ahora solo son refugiados sin hogar.

translation.en: We're not refugees.
We have a home.
[Nizar in English] We want one room.
Oh, OK.
So this is how it's gonna be.
Yes. Yusra and me in the beds, you on the floor next to the door
translation.es: Sí. Yusra y yo en las camas,tú en el suelo, al lado de la puerta,

translation.en: so you can protect us like you're meant to.
Get used to it.
[Nizar] Amazing.
I saw on Facebook that there's a square all the Syrians go to. We should go there.
translation.es: Vi en Facebook que los siriosse reúnen en una plaza. Deberíamos ir.

translation.en: You think you're gonna handle all the arrangements?
This is what you agreed with Baba.
translation.es: Es lo que acordaste con baba.

translation.en: -[clicks tongue] Exactly. -Yeah, whatever.
-[Yusra] You are keeping it there? -Yeah, where no one looks.
translation.es: - ¿Ahí lo guardabas?- Sí, nadie mira ahí.

translation.en: -Not what I heard! -What did you hear?
-[Yusra] Yalla! -[Nizar] Yeah?
[Yusra in Arabic] Don't hurt my sister.
[in English] That's my bed!
-[in Arabic] No, my bed. -I'm gonna pass out here.
-[Nizar in English] It's my bed! -[all laughing]
[Nizar in Arabic] Enough. What?
[in English] The floor it is.
I love you guys.
[in Arabic] We're looking for a smuggler.
Do you know someone reliable?
[in English] We have to cross that bridge.
I think we walked that way.
Turkey has more than two million Syrians, and he can't find any of them.
translation.es: Más de dos millones de sirios en Turquíay él no puede encontrar a ninguno.

translation.en: [in Arabic] We're still on the European side. Yeah, so where do we go?
translation.es: - No, seguimos del lado europeo.- Sí, ¿y ahora adónde?

translation.en: We've taken the wrong bridge.
[in English] Change of plan. No more following Nizar. Following them.
translation.es: Cambio de planes. Los seguiremos a ellos.

translation.en: -What? -From now on, we share leadership. Yalla.
When exactly did I have leadership?
[Sara] See? We should have been in charge from the start.
translation.es: Deberíamos haber estado al mandodesde el principio.

translation.en: [in Arabic] They have SIM cards.
-[in English] Do you speak English? -[vendor] A little.
We want SIM cards for Europe.
[in Arabic] What? Why are they dressed like that?
They can't sell the suits, so they put life jackets on them.
translation.es: No venden los trajes,así que les ponen chalecos salvavidas.

translation.en: -[Nizar in English] How much, please? -$2,000 each.
He says he can get us on a boat straight to Lesbos.
translation.es: Dice que puede subirnos a un botedirecto a Lesbos.

translation.en: A bus will take us down to the coast. It's $2,000 each.
translation.es: Un autobús nos lleva a la costa.Cuesta dos mil cada uno.

Sven called, by the way. About the refugee team.
translation.es: Por cierto, llamó Sveny mencionó el equipo de refugiados.

translation.en: You should do it.
This was everything you ever wanted.
Not in the way I want it.
translation.es: Pero no quería que fuera así.

translation.en: Yeah, but nothing has been the way we wanted it.
translation.es: Sí, pero nada ha salido como queríamos.

translation.en: Why would this be any different?
I want to swim for Syria.
That's what Baba wanted.
translation.es: Eso es lo que quiere baba.

translation.en: Baba ever tell you why he stopped swimming for Syria?
translation.es: ¿Baba te dijopor qué dejó de nadar para Siria?

translation.en: Military service.
He was actually very good. At the beginning, I thought it was an excuse, but it wasn't.
translation.es: De hecho, era muy bueno.Yo pensé que era una excusa, pero no.

translation.en: And he had to lose two years of training just to carry a gun.
translation.es: Y perdió dos años de entrenamientosolo para portar un arma.

translation.en: Life is not fair.
I'm Sara Mardini.
I have no country anymore.
This might be the only opportunity of your life.
translation.es: Esta podría ser la oportunidad de tu vida.

translation.en: Look at me.
Don't be stupid. Take it.
Oh, I was looking for you.
I wanted to go to the Olympics for Team Syria,
translation.es: Quería competir en el equipo de Siria,

translation.en: but if I can't, I'd like to swim for Team Sven.
translation.es: pero si no puedo,quisiera ser del equipo Sven.

translation.en: If you still want me to,
even though I'm stupid, and I don't deserve it.
translation.es: aunque sea una idiota y no lo merezca.

translation.en: For 2020, we will train for Syria, but for 2016, I'm Team Refugee.
translation.es: Para el 2020, entrenaremos para Siria, pero para el 2016,soy del equipo de los refugiados.

translation.en: We have a lot of work to do.
Ready?
[Ezzat in Arabic] Tell me about your training.
[Yusra] Of course, Baba.
[Ezzat] I want you to describe every detail.
The feeling underwater.
Every stroke, every move you make.
translation.es: cada brazada, cada movimiento que das.

translation.en: [in English] I want to know what this German has done.
translation.es: Quiero saber lo que ha hecho ese alemán.

translation.en: That was kind of "flop-flop." No, you have to…
The head is too high. Focus on the elbow.
translation.es: La cabeza está muy arriba. Mira el codo.

translation.en: OK?
What was my time?
Sven?
What was my time?
-We're going to Rio. -No.
-We're going to Rio. -We're going to Rio?
We're going to Rio!
-Hey! We are going to Rio! -[Yusra screams]
But I can't stop thinking about them.
translation.es: Pero no dejo de pensar en ellos.

translation.en: I saw on Facebook that 100,000 people
had to cross the sea to Greece in the last two months.
translation.es: cruzaron el mar hasta Grecialos últimos dos meses.

translation.en: You know, what we've been through isn't special.
Well…
What I saw on Facebook was this place in Sonnenallee
translation.es: Yo vi en Facebookun lugar en la calle Sonnenallee

translation.en: run by this guy from Damascus.
translation.es: que es de un tipo de Damasco.

translation.en: He makes the same whipped ice cream that he made back there.
translation.es: Hace el mismo helado batidoque hacía en casa.

translation.en: We should try it.
[mother in Arabic] An Olympian, my own daughter.
An Olympian, I don't believe it.
All that time at the poolside wasn't for nothing. It's good. It's as it should be.
translation.es: - Todo este tiempo no fue en vano.- Qué bien. No podría ser mejor.

translation.en: And Sara? You didn't have the times?
Even for this refugee team? No, Baba. I didn't.
translation.es: - ¿Ni para el equipo de refugiados?- No, baba.

translation.en: "Refugee team"? You say it like it doesn't count.
translation.es: Lo dices como si ese equipo no contara.

translation.en: Nice tracksuit.
-[Yusra] What have you done? -It's good at the back?
[Yusra] It's beautiful.
[Sara] I always wanted it short.
I wanna tell you something.
I've decided…
I'm going back to Lesbos.
[in Arabic] What?
[in English] I found this organization, and I've been emailing them,
and they help everyone who's crossing.
translation.es: y ayudan a todos los que cruzan.

translation.en: -I want to be part of this. -No, Sara, please.
translation.es: - Quiero ser parte de eso.- No, Sara, por favor.

translation.en: We need to move on, go forward.
-What are you doing? -I need to be there. To help everyone.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces?- Necesito estar ahí y ayudarlos.

translation.en: Give them water, shoes, everything we didn't have.
translation.es: Darles agua, calzado,todo lo que no tuvimos.

translation.en: You know, Mama, Shahed, Baba will come the same way, maybe.
translation.es: Mamá, Shahed y baba quizá vengan por ahí.

translation.en: So you won't come with me to Rio?
Look, you were right. I've never done anything with my life.
translation.es: Mira, tenías razón.No he hecho nada con mi vida.

translation.en: This is the first time I feel this.
translation.es: Es la primera vez que siento esto.

translation.en: Look, you can move on.
You can become an Olympian. I can't.
translation.es: Puedes ser atleta olímpica. Yo no.

translation.en: This is the right thing for me.
translation.es: Esto es lo mejor para mí.

translation.en: [Nizar] What's this?
[Yusra] I was going to wait for your birthday.
translation.es: Iba a esperar hasta tu cumpleaños.

translation.en: Happy early birthday! [chuckles]
You remembered my birthday?
You're not allowed to give up.
-Thank you. -No, thank you.
Maybe you are my favorite cousin.
translation.es: Quizá sí eres mi prima favorita.

translation.en: I don't believe you. You said this to Sara last week, so…
translation.es: La semana pasadale dijiste lo mismo a Sara.

translation.en: I think I'll get going. I'll leave you prepare your stuff.
translation.es: Bueno, me iré.Dejaré que prepares tus cosas.

translation.en: [in Arabic] Uh… You've made us walk taller.
Don't worry about winning.
I am so proud of you.
Peace.
[in English] Bye.
[woman on PA] Next stop, the Olympic Village.
[man in English] Welcome to Rio de Janeiro.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a Río de Janeiro. LOS ATLETAS LLEGAN A LA VILLA OLÍMPICA

translation.en: 11,238 athletes from 207 nations
gathering to take part in the Games of the 31st Olympiad,
translation.es: se reúnen para participarde los trigésimos primeros JJ. OO.,

translation.en: the greatest sporting spectacle in the world.
translation.es: el espectáculo deportivomás grande del mundo.

translation.en: [Yusra] Thank you.
-What's that? -I don't know!
[man] But one new team has been generating a special buzz. The Refugee Olympic Team.
translation.es: Un equipo se ha llevado toda la atención:el Equipo Olímpico de Atletas Refugiados.

translation.en: -So, Yusra, welcome to Rio. -Thank you.
-Oh my God, that's David Rudisha. -Who?
translation.es: EQUIPO OLÍMPICO DE ATLETAS REFUGIADOS - Cielos, David Rudisha.- ¿Quién?

translation.en: Don't you know anybody?
I've been swimming since I was a kid.
[man on PA] Welcome to the world-famous Maracanã Stadium
translation.es: AQUÍ ESTUVO YUSRA MARDINI Bienvenidos al famoso estadio de Maracaná

translation.en: in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, for the opening ceremony.
translation.es: en Río de Janeiro, Brasil,para la ceremonia de apertura.

translation.en: [woman on PA] They have traveled from all corners of the earth
translation.es: Han venidode todos los rincones del planeta

translation.en: and have spent a lifetime training for this moment.
translation.es: y han entrenado toda su vidapara este momento.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the great moment has arrived.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros,ha llegado el gran momento.

translation.en: [announcer] We welcome the Refugee Olympic Team.
translation.es: Recibimos al Equipo Olímpicode Atletas Refugiados.

translation.en: [man on PA] A journey that has taken the flame all the way from Greece to Rio.
translation.es: Un recorrido que ha llevado a la antorchadesde Grecia hasta Río.

translation.en: [all chanting] Refugees!
Sara!
Sara!
[screams] Sara!
I want to know, for everyone out there, what's been your main motivation…
translation.es: Quiero preguntarte, en nombre de todos,cuál ha sido tu principal motivación…

translation.en: [girl 1] That's the Syrian girl that's racing today.
translation.es: Esa es la chica siria que competirá hoy.

translation.en: [girl 2] I mean, I'm all for charity, but…
translation.es: Me parece bien hacer caridad, pero…

translation.en: [girl 1] Exactly. The rest of us had to work to be here.
translation.es: Exacto. Los demásdebimos esforzarnos para llegar.

translation.en: [Yusra on TV] Yeah, it's such an honor to be part of it.
translation.es: Sí, es un gran honor poder participar.

translation.en: It's a chance to be a voice and to give hope.
translation.es: Es una oportunidadpara enviar un mensaje de esperanza.

translation.en: Hi. [Sara] So, aren't you about to swim your race?
translation.es: - Hola.- ¿No estás a punto de competir?

translation.en: -Yes. -What are you doing sitting on your ass?
How do you--
[Yusra screeches] I can't believe you're here!
This is crazy!
Sister.
How did you get here?
I contacted the sponsor of the refugee team,
translation.es: Contacté al espónsordel equipo de refugiados

translation.en: and I told them that I was the sister of the world-famous Yusra Mardini.
translation.es: y le dije que era la hermanade la mundialmente famosa Yusra Mardini.

translation.en: -And I even flew business class. -What?!
-We were in economy. -I don't fly economy, habibi.
translation.es: - Nosotros, en económica.- Yo no viajo así.

translation.en: -And what about Lesbos? -I'm gonna go straight after.
translation.es: - ¿Qué hay de Lesbos?- Iré desde aquí.

translation.en: I wanna show you something.
[in Arabic] Good luck, my love. I'm not worried because you're lucky.
translation.es: Buena suerte, mi amor.No me preocupo porque eres afortunada.

translation.en: Luck has nothing to do with it. Remember everything I've taught you.
translation.es: La suerte no tiene nada que ver.Recuerda todo lo que te enseñé.

translation.en: I hope you win.
[in English] Good luck, Yusra. We love you. We miss you.
translation.es: Buena suerte, Yusra.Te amamos y te extrañamos.

translation.en: So grown-up!
[Shada] Good luck.
[Sara] Actually, I didn't really wanna show you this one.
translation.es: De hecho, no quería mostrarte esa.

translation.en: [Yusra] Why? Is she back in Eritrea?
Is she safe?
I heard other swimmers talking.
They said I shouldn't be here.
translation.es: Dijeron que no debería estar aquí.

translation.en: They said I don't deserve it.
Well, they're right. You shouldn't.
translation.es: Bueno, tienen razón.No deberías estar aquí.

translation.en: You should be at the bottom of the Greek sea.
translation.es: Deberías estar en el fondo del mar Egeo.

translation.en: Or sleeping on the roadside of Hungaria.
translation.es: O durmiendo en la carretera de Hungría.

translation.en: Or you should be dead in a hole in Dariyya.
translation.es: O quizá muerta en un agujero en Diriyah.

translation.en: I just wanna be a swimmer.
You know Olympians are people who are supposed to do amazing things.
translation.es: Los atletas olímpicosdeben lograr cosas grandiosas.

translation.en: Don't do that.
Remember what Baba used to say?
"Find your lane. Swim your race."
It's all bullshit.
[man on PA] Please welcome the athletes in heat one
translation.es: Démosles la bienvenida a las atletas

translation.en: of the women's 100m butterfly.
translation.es: de la primera serie femeninade 100 m mariposa.

translation.en: [Sara] You should swim for all of us.
[Sara] You should swim for Baba
because he didn't.
Swim for me
because I couldn't.
Swim for Sven because he couldn't.
translation.es: Nada por Sven porque él no pudo.

translation.en: Swim for Shada.
Swim for Razan Haddad.
[man on PA] Swimming for Qatar in lane two, Nada Arakji.
translation.es: Representando a Qatar,en el segundo carril, Nada Arakji.

translation.en: And for everyone who died trying to find a new life.
translation.es: Y por todos los que murieronbuscando una nueva vida.

translation.en: Swim for them.
[man on PA] Swimming in lane three for Rwanda, Johanna Umurungi.
translation.es: Representando a Ruanda,en el tercer carril, Johanna Umurungi.

translation.en: You're so much more than an Olympian.
translation.es: Eres más que una atleta olímpica.

translation.en: [man on PA] Swimming in lane four for the Refugee Olympic Team,
translation.es: En el cuarto carril,representando al Equipo de Refugiados,

translation.en: [announcer] Take your marks.
-Yusra, go! -Faster!
Yeah!
-[sobbing] -Yusra!
Yeah! Yeah! [laughing]
-Are you racing me? -Are we racing?
Sara, please, I'm tired.
-No one's forcing you to race. -I hate you.
translation.es: - Nadie te obliga a correr.- Te odio.

translation.en: You love me!
Kiss my Olympic ass. I'm gonna kick your Olympic ass!
translation.es: - Besa mi trasero olímpico.- ¡Te lo patearé!

translation.en: [laughing] No! No!
